page.title: 03Home life
page.content: Eating Habits ------------------------------------- The most common eating pattern for children in our school seems to be an uncooked breakfast of cereal and/or toast;sandwiches for lunch and a cooked meal in the evening.For their cooked meal,most people have fresh meat with frozen or fresh vegtables. Generally people seem to be more aware of which foods are good for them and health foods are becoming quite popular.For example, more people eat brown bread rather than white and the majority of children eat fruit each day.Salads are popular in the summer and nearly everyone drinks milk each day. People are more adventurous too with Chinese and Indian food becoming much more popular,whilst the English habit of eating fish'n'chips is less popular
